 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרַב‎</span> **verb** ==take on pledge, give in pledge, exchange== (Late Hebrew ***go surety for*** (rare); Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערב‎</span> ***surety***; Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ערבא‎</span> ***pledge***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרַב‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***go surety for***; usually identified with I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערב‎</span> — ***mix, exchange, pledge*** — but quite uncertain; compare [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex</sup> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 203</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Gen.44.32|Gen 44:32]] + 4 t.; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרַבְתָּ‎</span> [[Prov.6.1|Prov 6:1]] ***Imperfect*** 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶעֶרְבֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Gen.43.9|Gen 43:9]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרֹב‎</span> [[Ps.119.122|Ps 119:122]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרְבֵנִי‎</span> [[Isa.38.14|Isa 38:14]], so [[Job.17.3|Job 17:3]] (but see below); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲרֹב‎</span> [[Ezek.27.9|Ezek 27:9]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹרֵב‎</span> [[Prov.17.18|Prov 17:18]], etc.; — 

**1.** with accusative of person ***taken on pledge***, i.e. ***go surety for*** the safety of, [[Gen.43.9|Gen 43:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.44.32|Gen 44:32]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעִם‎</span> person); for the debts of [[Prov.11.15|Prov 11:15]]; [[Prov.20.16|Prov 20:16]]; [[Prov.27.13|Prov 27:13]] of God [[Isa.38.14|Isa 38:14]] ***go surety for me***, [[Ps.119.122|Ps 119:122]], so [[Job.17.3|Job 17:3]] (si vera lectio, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵרָבוֺן‎</span>); accusative of person omitted, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Prov.6.1|Prov 6:1]] ***go surety to*** one (in behalf of another, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּקַע לַזָּר כַּפֶּ֑יךָ‎</span>); with accusative of thing [[Prov.22.26|Prov 22:26]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּקְעֵיכָֿ֑ף‎</span>). 

**2.** ***give in pledge***, with accusative of thing [[Neh.5.3|Neh 5:3]] (i.e. mortagage), figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתלִֿבּוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Jer.30.21|Jer 30:21]] so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרֻבָּה לִפְנֵי רֵעֵהוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Prov.17.18|Prov 17:18]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּקֵעַ כָּ֑ף‎</span>). 

**3.** ***exchange*** (in trade), with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעֲרָבֵךְ‎</span> [[Ezek.27.9|Ezek 27:9]]; [[Ezek.27.27|Ezek 27:27]]. 

**Hithpa\`el 1.** reciprocal: ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעָ֫רֶב נָא אֶתאֲֿדֹנִי‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.23|2Kgs 18:23]] ***exchange pledges*** (make a bargain) ***with my lord*** = [[Isa.36.8|Isa 36:8]]. 

**2. a.** ***have fellowship*** with, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person, ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעָֽרְבוּ‎</span> [[Ezra.9.2|Ezra 9:2]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְעָֽרְבוּ‎</span> [[Ps.106.35|Ps 106:35]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְעָרָ֑ב‎</span> with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> person [[Prov.20.19|Prov 20:19]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> person [[Prov.24.21|Prov 24:21]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***share*** in, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> of thing, 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְעָרַב‎</span> [[Prov.14.10|Prov 14:10]] in his joy no other ***shares.***.
